name: Heart of Moon: The Mask of Seasons
name_original: Heart of Moon: The Mask of Seasons
description:
Clara and her adoptive father have discovered the location of an ancient artifact called the Mask of Seasons. It is supposed to be hidden in a temple on an island, lost in the middle of the Pacific. Legend tells that this Mask is responsible for the extreme weather conditions there. A fantastic journey awaits you through 200 exciting levels.
Collect resources, find various artifacts and weapons, defeat your enemies in epic battles and find enough gold to restore the island. But above all, get your hand on this incredibly powerful Artifact: The Mask of Seasons!

  • 200 Innovative and dynamic levels
  • Collect resources
  • Help the inhabitants restore their island
  • Spot the difference and hidden object scenes
